title: A Christmas Carol Cookbook for the Whole Family: Recipes That Have the Power to Wake up Everyone's Holiday Spirit
description: If you love Christmas and you have read the Christmas Carol by Charles Dickens so many times, you are probably dreaming about a Christmas that you can experience like in Victorian times.Well, you are in luck because this cookbook will help you do just that. Inspired by the book and by the Victorian times the recipes will make you cook them long before Christmas. They are irresistible. From Victorian-style side dishes to entrees and desserts that you can make in simplified steps, you will become the true savior of the Christmas spirit.In this Entrees inspired by the Christmas CarolSide dishes and starters with a short prep and cook timeDesserts that will surprise everyoneRecipe for Charles Dickensâ€™ favorite punchAnd more!
author: Ronny Emerson
